question: Analyze the social media engagement of companies in the technology sector.

subtasks.task: Identify all companies in the technology sector using the CompanyInfo table.

Retrieve social media engagement metrics (likes, comments, engagement rates) from the CompanyFacebookDetail, CompanyTwitterDetail, CompanyInstagramDetail, and CompanyYoutubeDetail tables for the identified technology companies.
Aggregate the engagement metrics to compare which social media platform has the highest engagement for technology companies.
Analyze and visualize the aggregated data to identify trends in social media usage among technology companies.
